```{r setup}
setwd("..")  # Move one folder up from 'reports/' to the main project

ProjectTemplate::load.project()
```

```{r}
#Inspect the summary data
head(penguins_summary)
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(penguins_summary, aes(x = species, y = body_mass_kg_mean)) +
geom_col(fill = "#0077bf") +
geom_errorbar(
aes(
ymin = body_mass_kg_mean - body_mass_kg_sd,
ymax = body_mass_kg_mean + body_mass_kg_sd
),
width = 0.2
) +
labs(
title = "Average Penguin Body Mass (kg) by Species",
x = "Species",
y = "Mean Â± SD (kg)"
) +
theme_minimal()

```
